name: Overflow (itch) (kfmm)
description:
Things quickly get out of control in this 2D puzzler, as your speed exponentially increases every second! Use your speed to break special blocks in order to reach all the goal tiles!

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, R to restart and ESC to quit.

Art, code, and design by kfm and Symphonym

Certain SFX assets from bundle by Beep Yeah!

Song asset from bundle by Bit By Bit Bert

Made during GMTK2020
